descriptionHtml:
I love Chesko\'s brilliant Wearable Lanterns Mod

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416

I can\'t play Skyrim without Brumbek\'s awesome SMIM .

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655

However, with both mods installed, while Skyrim homes now have sleek, elegant SMIM lanterns, my character is stuck lugging around a crude, vanilla hunk of junk.

I looked around and since nobody seems to have done it yet... here\'s a crude Compatibility Patch.

Install with NMM, or just unzip to your Skyrim folder. 

Needless to say, since this is just a compatibility patch, you need to have both the aforementioned mods installed first for it to do anything.

Works for me. Hope it works for everyone. If not, then I guess you\'ll have to wait and hope Brumbek will take the time and show folks how it\'s done himself. :)

First time uploading, not sure what permissions are involved, especially since this is merely a patch that does nothing on its own. If I\'m not going through the proper process, someone inform me and I\'ll remove this right away. Thanks.
author: Telamont

files.name: Wearable Lanterns SMIM Patch - for Guards
